name: Fernando Flores
body:
I work in software development and consulting, currently building a career in data science. You can find me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/floresf/en).

### Data science formation
After finishing most of the courses in Coursera's Data Science Specialization, I think this is a good place to show some interesting projects from my github profile:

#### R Programming
[Project 1](https://github.com/floresfdev/RProg_Project1)  
[Project 2](https://github.com/floresfdev/ProgrammingAssignment2)  
[Project 3](https://github.com/floresfdev/RProg_Project3)  

#### Getting and Cleaning Data
[Project](https://github.com/floresfdev/getdata-courseproject)  

#### Exploratory Data Analysis
[Project 1](https://github.com/floresfdev/ExData_Plotting1)  
[Project 2](https://github.com/floresfdev/ExData_Project2)  

#### Reproducible Research
[Project 1](https://github.com/floresfdev/RepData_PeerAssessment1)  
[Project 2](https://github.com/floresfdev/RepData_Project2) and [also in RPubs](http://rpubs.com/floresf/128320)  

#### Statistical inference
In progress...
